title: Manufacturer

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Create a replica of an Authorized player. Whenever a non-Sentry visits the player, they'll visit the replica instead.
- Create a replica of a non-Authorized player. Whenever anyone visits the player, they'll visit the replica instead. (1 use)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- The replica will use whatever replicated ability it has on **all** visitors. You'll learn all the feedback. If the original role had limited uses, the replica doesn't care.
- If the replica dies, you'll take one damage. Upon taking three damage, you'll die. You can also die to normal attacks, though.

desc:
Post 2395
*We've finally got that shipment coming in. Let's use this to our advantange.*
